body:
Those guys who don't believe in Avicus are shit, Avicus won't die, actually It's getting more players.. :D

Yesterday when I went on my profile to check some random stuff...
I checked my kill stats thingy, where you can see who you recently killed and stuff like that.. 
I saw some different player heads, some different usernames...

I checked their profile and realized that they where new!!

So I just want to say welcome to a few of our new members who has joined recently!!

Welcome to Sweet_summer who joined 8 days ago!!
Welcome to Minz who joined 28 days ago!!
Welcome to ShoxyPvP who joined 4 days ago!!
Welcome to technik3k who joined 23 days ago!!
Welcome to ViKing725 who joined 6 hours ago!!

Of course there could be more player who has joined, but these are the ones I found :D <3

title: Welcome to our new members!!

replies.body: This thread isn't really necessary, just welcome them when they make their introduction threads, or when they're in game.
